pkgmetadata.longdescription: Simulation of Longitudinal Data // Simulation and visualization of complex models for longitudinal data. The models are encoded using the model coding language 'Mlxtran', automatically converted into C++ codes, compiled on the fly and linked to R using the 'Rcpp' package. That allows one to implement very easily complex ODE-based models and complex statistical models, including mixed effects models, for continuous, count, categorical, and time-to-event data.
